dict.acceptation: 牛肉；菜牛（饲养以供肉食的牛）；体力；怨言，牢骚；

sent.orig: Beef is generally cured by making corned beef of dried beef using the abovementionde ingredients.
sent.trans: 牛肉通常会被上述提到的这些成分做成盐腌牛肉或干腌牛肉。

sent.orig: When beef is cooked in the release, not beef soup.
sent.trans: 是在煮牛肉时放的，牛肉汤里没有。

sent.orig: W:Your roast beef is ready. Enjoy our roast beef, please.
sent.trans: 你的烤牛肉好了，请享用我们的烤牛肉。

sent.orig: Demand for beef is expected to remain strong as consumers switch to lower-cost ground beef.
sent.trans: 而对牛肉的需求预计将保护强势，这是因为客户将转向成本较低的牛肉碎。

sent.orig: Beef is the best tradition of human meat, beef on spot for why human beings do?
sent.trans: 牛肉，是人类传统最佳肉食，为什么人类对牛肉情有独钟呢？
